name: BoTree Technologies
description:
We are in the business of offering expert software engineering and development services for bespoke applications.
BoTree works with companies as small as a 2 person startup to large Fortune 500 companies. Since inception in 2013, BoTree has worked with clients across the US, EU, UK, Singapore, Japan, and Australia.
A team with a strong focus on Quality, BoTree has successfully built and delivered applications in domains like
 
Marketing and Advertising
Health Care
eCommerce
Publishing
Insurance
RealEstate
Education and more...
Core expertise:
Ruby on Rails/Spree Commerce/Shopify
Python/Django
Machine Learning, AI and Chatbots
Front end development (AngularJS and ReactJS)
Mobile Application Development using React Native
RPA using UiPath(Advanced Certified), Automation Anywhere, and Blue Prism
The core team at BoTree has a combined experience of over 5 decades. We have developed and improved upon processes to ensure high quality and on-time delivery every time.
With a strong sense of ownership and providing customer satisfaction, BoTree has surpassed expectations of almost all its clients.
We are looking for interesting business challenges. Do you have one for us? Let's talk.
READ MORE...

locations.address: FF – 1,2, JBR Arcade, Science City Road, Sola
